mapper.select: SELECT h.mhId, memberName, mhName, mhNum, mhPhone, memberEmail, mhAddr1, mhAddr2, mhZip, mhSign, h.mhEnabled FROM memberHost h JOIN member1 m1 ON h.mhId = m1.memberId WHERE h.mhId = #{mhId}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberHost SET mhEnabled=#{mhEnabled} WHERE mhId=#{mhId}
UPDATE member1 SET memberAuth=2 WHERE memberId=#{mhId}
UPDATE memberHost SET mhSign=1 WHERE mhId=#{mhId}
